an2.98-117:4.3: One who takes responsibility for what has not come to pass, and one who doesn’t take responsibility for what has come to pass.
an2.98-117:6.3: One who doesn’t take responsibility for what has not come to pass, and one who does take responsibility for what has come to pass.
an2.98-117:6.4: These are the two who are astute.”
an2.98-117:8.3: One who perceives what is unallowable as allowable, and one who perceives what is allowable as unallowable.
an2.98-117:10.3: One who perceives what is unallowable as unallowable, and one who perceives what is allowable as allowable.
an2.98-117:10.4: These are the two who are astute.”
an2.98-117:12.3: One who perceives a non-offense as an offense, and one who perceives an offense as a non-offense.
an2.98-117:14.3: One who perceives a non-offense as a non-offense, and one who perceives an offense as an offense.
an2.98-117:14.4: These are the two who are astute.”
an2.98-117:16.3: One who perceives what is not the teaching as the teaching, and one who perceives the teaching as not the teaching.
an2.98-117:18.3: One who perceives the teaching as the teaching, and one who perceives what is not the teaching as not the teaching.
an2.98-117:18.4: These are the two who are astute.”
an2.98-117:20.3: One who perceives what is not the training as the training, and one who perceives what is the training as not the training.
an2.98-117:22.3: One who perceives what is not the training as not the training, and one who perceives what is the training as the training.
an2.98-117:22.4: These are the two who are astute.”
an2.98-117:24.3: One who is remorseful over something he shouldn’t be, and one who isn’t remorseful over something he should be.
an2.98-117:24.4: These are the two whose defilements grow.”
an2.98-117:26.3: One who isn’t remorseful over something he shouldn’t be, and one who is remorseful over something he should be.
an2.98-117:26.4: These are the two whose defilements don’t grow.”
an2.98-117:28.3: One who perceives what is unallowable as allowable, and one who perceives what is allowable as unallowable.
an2.98-117:28.4: These are the two whose defilements grow.”
an2.98-117:30.3: One who perceives what is unallowable as unallowable, and one who perceives what is allowable as allowable.
an2.98-117:30.4: These are the two whose defilements don’t grow.”
an2.98-117:32.3: One who perceives an offense as a non-offense, and one who perceives a non-offense as an offense.
an2.98-117:32.4: These are the two whose defilements grow.”
an2.98-117:34.3: One who perceives an offense as an offense, and one who perceives a non-offense as a non-offense.
an2.98-117:34.4: These are the two whose defilements don’t grow.”
an2.98-117:36.3: One who perceives what is not the teaching as the teaching, and one who perceives the teaching as not the teaching.
an2.98-117:36.4: These are the two whose defilements grow.”
an2.98-117:38.3: One who perceives the teaching as the teaching, and one who perceives what is not the teaching as not the teaching.
an2.98-117:38.4: These are the two whose defilements don’t grow.”
an2.98-117:40.3: One who perceives what is not the training as the training, and one who perceives what is the training as not the training.
an2.98-117:40.4: These are the two whose defilements grow.”
an2.98-117:42.1: “For these two, the defilements don’t grow.
an2.98-117:42.3: One who perceives what is not the training as not the training, and one who perceives what is the training as the training.
an2.98-117:42.4: These are the two whose defilements don’t grow.”
